'''Tighnari''' is a playable [[Dendro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

A [[Forest Watchers|Forest Watcher]] on profile in Gandharva Ville. Despite his intelligence, he prefers to live a solitary life in the depths of [[Avidya Forest]] rather than in the ivory tower of [[Sumeru Akademiya]].
